jd: From: Aniket Dhakar, Technocraft Solutions aniket.dhakar@technocraftsol.com Reply to: aniket.dhakar@technocraftsol.com Position: IOS/Mobile Project ManageLocation: Sunnyvale, CA Responsibilities:Identify, mitigate, prioritize and manage complex Mobile / iOS app development projectsResolve project issues, constraints, dependencies and risksFormulate, execute project plans, and manage cross-functional project teamsEffectively communicate technical issues and provide input in high level design discussionsManage execution of multiple concurrent projects of different size and complexityAbility to drive a project from concept to delivery, on schedule and to specification Required Skills: A minimum of 5 years of Project Management experiencePreferred Mobile / iOS Project Management app development experience Open to Web, Software and / or eCommerce Project Management experience Agile MethodologyExperience with consumer facing, high-volume mobile applications. Ability to thrive in a fast paced and demanding environment with multiple prioritiesA self-starter, a Leader, ability to drive tasks to closure quickly, ability to implement processes and change controls when necessary
